properties.funfact_en: It can take many years for the clay layer to swell fully and become watertight. The pond is replenished with rainwater from the roof of our barn, which is conveyed here through an underground pipe.
properties.funfact: Bis die Tonschicht vollständig zugequollen und dicht ist, können viele Jahre vergehen. Nachgefüllt wird der Teich durch Regenwasser vom Dach unserer Scheune, das durch ein unterirdisches Rohr hier eingeleitet wird.
properties.desc_en: Originally, there was a depression at this location, presumably created by excavation. By dredging the clayey subsoil and sealing it with a thick layer of clay, a near-natural pond was created, similar to the ice-age–formed ponds (Pfuhle) commonly found in the Berlin region. Dragonflies, bees, and other insects use it as a watering place, and insect-eating animals such as bats, amphibians, and birds find their food here.
properties.title: Naturnaher Teich (66 W.)

properties.title: Flakgeschütze auf der Domäne Dahlem (140 W.)

properties.funfact: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consetetur sadipscing elitr, sed diam nonumy eirmod tempor invidunt ut labore et dolore magna aliquyam
properties.desc_en: After the end of the Second World War, the United States Army was permanently stationed in Germany. Its headquarters were located in the Berlin district of Dahlem. The military radio broadcaster AFN (American Forces Network), which had already been founded during the war, also established itself in Dahlem. For this purpose, a building was constructed in 1948 that could be used as a maintenance facility for the transmission mast.
properties.title: Radiosender AFN (54 W.)
